titles.title: A concurrent resolution to commend the Department of State's Science and Technology Officers on their outstanding performance and to recognize the importance of their work to the Congress and to the Nation.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 9/22/1988--Introduced. Congratulates the Department of State's Science and Technology Officers on their performance. Urges the Secretary of State to make efforts to enhance the number and professional standing of such officers. Calls for expanded communications between the Congress and the Department of State regarding science, technology, and diplomacy.
